channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- NextScripts: Social Networks Auto-Poster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- NextScripts: Social Networks Auto-Poster

item.title: CVE-2021-24975|2024-08-03T19:49:14.049Z -- unknown -- nextscripts%3A%20social%20networks%20auto-poster
item.description: The NextScripts: Social Networks Auto-Poster WordPress plugin before 4.3.24 does not sanitise and escape logged requests before outputting them in the related admin dashboard, leading to an Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue

item.title: CVE-2021-25072|2024-08-03T19:56:09.925Z -- unknown -- nextscripts%3A%20social%20networks%20auto-poster
item.description: The NextScripts: Social Networks Auto-Poster WordPress plugin before 4.3.25 does not have CSRF check in place when deleting items, allowing attacker to make a logged in admin delete arbitrary posts via a CSRF attack
